pages.index: Happy Paws - Your Trusted Indian Pet Store Happy Paws about us catalog services contact Happy Paws Quality Care and Joyful Tails Welcome to Happy Paws! We are delighted to have you here at Happy Paws, where your pets’ happiness is our priority. As your trusted Indian pet store, we strive to provide you and your furry companions with the highest quality products and services. Whether you’re a proud parent of a playful pup, a curious cat, or any other beloved pet, we have everything you need to ensure their well-being and joy. At Happy Paws, we believe that pets are family. Our journey began with a simple mission: to create a haven for pet owners where they can find the best for their pets all under one roof. Our team of dedicated pet enthusiasts is passionate about animals and committed to providing top-notch customer service and expert advice. see products Our Story Happy Paws was founded with a deep love for animals and a desire to create a better world for pets and their owners. Our journey began when our founders noticed the lack of quality pet products and services in the local market. As a lifelong pet enthusiast, they were determined to fill this gap and provide a comprehensive solution for pet owners. In 2019, Happy Paws opened its doors with a small team of passionate individuals who shared the same vision. From the very beginning, our goal was simple: to offer the best products and services for pets while ensuring an exceptional shopping experience for their owners. What started as a modest pet shop has now grown into a trusted name in the pet care industry, serving countless happy customers across India. Our Goals Quality Products To provide a wide range of high-quality pet products that cater to the diverse needs of different pets. Customer Satisfaction To ensure every customer has a pleasant and hassle-free shopping experience, both online and in-store. Education and Awareness To educate pet owners on proper pet care, nutrition, and overall well-being through expert advice and resources. Community Engagement To build a community of pet lovers who can share experiences, seek advice, and support each other. Innovation To continuously innovate and expand our product range and services to meet the evolving needs of pets and their owners. Our Mission At Happy Paws, our mission is to enhance the lives of pets and their owners by providing top-notch products, exceptional services, and valuable information. We are dedicated to: Promoting Pet Health and Happiness Ensuring that every product we offer meets the highest standards of quality and safety to keep pets healthy and happy. Supporting Pet Owners Offering personalized advice and resources to help pet owners make informed decisions about their pet’s care. Fostering a Love for Animals Encouraging responsible pet ownership and fostering a deep bond between pets and their owners. Making a Positive Impact Giving back to the community by supporting animal welfare initiatives and partnering with local shelters and rescue organizations. Our Products At Happy Paws, we take pride in offering a wide range of high-quality products to meet all your pet's needs. From nutritious food and fun toys to comfortable beds and essential grooming supplies, we have everything to keep your pets happy, healthy, and entertained. Explore our diverse selection and find the perfect items for your beloved furry, feathered, or finned friends. Pet Food For Cats High-quality food for your feline friends, ensuring they stay healthy and happy. For Dogs Nutritious and delicious food for your dogs, catering to all breeds and sizes. For Birds Healthy food options for your feathered friends, keeping them chirpy and active. For Fish Premium food to ensure your fish thrive in their aquatic environment. Toys and Accessories Toys Engaging and fun toys to keep your pets entertained and mentally stimulated. Beds Comfortable and cozy beds for your pets to rest and relax. Clothing Stylish and functional clothing for your pets to look their best. Leashes and Collars Durable and fashionable leashes and collars for safe and stylish walks. Grooming Supplies Shampoos High-quality shampoos to keep your pet's coat clean and shiny. Brushes Effective brushes to keep your pet's coat free of tangles and mats. Nail Clippers Safe and precise nail clippers for your pet's grooming needs. Other Supplies Various grooming tools to ensure your pet looks and feels their best. get the consultation Our Services Grooming We offer professional grooming services to keep your pet looking and feeling their best. Our grooming services include coat care, haircuts, and baths tailored to your pet's specific needs. Consultations Receive personalized advice on your pet's nutrition, behavior, and overall care. Our expert consultants are here to help you make the best decisions for your pet's health and happiness. Delivery Enjoy the convenience of our home delivery service. We offer fast and reliable delivery of all our products right to your doorstep. Check our delivery terms and fees for more details. learn more Why Choose Happy Paws? We understand that every pet is unique, and so are their needs. That’s why we carefully select our products to ensure they meet the highest standards of quality and safety. Our friendly and knowledgeable staff is always here to help you make the best choices for your pet. Thank you for choosing Happy Paws. Together, let’s make every moment with your pet special. Shop with us today and discover why we are the preferred pet store for pet lovers across India! Contact us If you have any questions about our products or services, need to place an order, or would like to request a consultation, we are here to help. Please fill out the form below with your details and the nature of your inquiry, and one of our friendly team members will get in touch with you as soon as possible. We are committed to providing excellent customer service and ensuring your satisfaction with every interaction. I accept Privacy Policy send Happy Paws Commitment to Excellence Our commitment to excellence drives everything we do at Happy Paws. We continuously strive to improve our offerings and services to meet and exceed the expectations of our customers. Our team of dedicated professionals works tirelessly to ensure that every pet and pet owner receives the best possible care and attention. Thank you for being a part of the Happy Paws family. Together, we can create a happier and healthier world for our beloved pets. Dhanekula Institute of Engineering & Technology, Vijayawada, Gangur, Andhra Pradesh 521139, India +91-220-2354125 happypaws@gmail.com Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
pages.privacy: Privacy Policy for Happy Paws Happy Paws about us catalog services contact Privacy Policy for Happy Paws Introduction Welcome to Happy Paws! Your privacy and security are important to us. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you visit our website or use our services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to the terms of this Privacy Policy. Information We Collect 1. Personal Information: When you place an order, request a consultation, or contact us, we collect personal information such as: Name Email address Phone number 2. Usage Data: We collect information about your interactions with our website, including: IP address Browser type Device type Pages visited Time and date of visits How We Use Your Information 1. To Process Orders: We use your personal information to fulfill orders and deliver products or services. 2. To Provide Customer Support: We use your contact information to respond to inquiries, provide customer support, and assist with any issues you may encounter. 3. To Improve Our Website: We analyze usage data to improve our website's functionality, performance, and user experience. 4. To Send Marketing Communications: With your consent, we may send you promotional emails or newsletters about our products, services, and special offers. You can opt-out of these communications at any time. How We Protect Your Information We implement a range of security measures to safeguard your personal information, including: Secure servers and encryption Access controls and authentication protocols Regular security audits and updates Sharing Your Information We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information with: Service Providers: Third parties who assist us in processing payments, delivering products, or providing customer support. Legal Requirements: Authorities or regulatory bodies if required by law or to protect our rights and interests. Your Rights and Choices 1. Access and Update: You have the right to access, correct, or update your personal information. You can do this by contacting us at happypaws@gmail.com. 2. Opt-Out: You can opt-out of receiving marketing communications by following the unsubscribe instructions provided in emails or contacting us directly. 3. Data Deletion: You may request the deletion of your personal information. We will comply with your request, subject to legal and contractual obligations. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated effective date. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy periodically. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about this Privacy Policy or our privacy practices, please contact us at: happypaws@gmail.com. Happy Paws Dhanekula Institute of Engineering & Technology, Vijayawada, Gangur, Andhra Pradesh 521139, India +91-220-2354125 happypaws@gmail.com Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
pages.terms-conditions: Terms and Conditions for Happy Paws Happy Paws about us catalog services contact Terms and Conditions for Happy Paws Welcome to Happy Paws! These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your access to and use of our website and our services. By accessing or using our website, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our website or services. 1. Use of Our Website 1.1 Eligibility: You must be at least 18 years old to use our website or services. By using our website, you represent and warrant that you meet this requirement. 1.2 Account Responsibility: If you create an account with us, you are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account details and for all activities that occur under your account. Notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account. 1.3 Prohibited Activities: You agree not to engage in any of the following activities: Using our website for illegal purposes or to engage in fraudulent activities. Interfering with or disrupting the operation of our website or servers. Attempting to gain unauthorized access to our systems or data. 2. Intellectual Property 2.1 Ownership: All content on our website, including text, images, graphics, logos, and trademarks, is the property of Happy Paws or its licensors and is protected by intellectual property laws. 2.2 Limited License: You are granted a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable license to access and use our website for personal, non-commercial purposes. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works based on our content without our prior written permission. 3. Limitation of Liability 3.1 Disclaimer: Our website and services are provided on an "as-is" and "as-available" basis. We make no warranties, express or implied, regarding the accuracy, completeness, or reliability of our website or services. 3.2 Limitation of Liability: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Happy Paws shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising from your use of our website or services, even if we have been advised of the possibility of such damages. 4. Indemnification You agree to indemnify, defend, and hold harmless Happy Paws, its affiliates, officers, directors, employees, and agents from and against any claims, liabilities, damages, losses, and expenses arising out of or related to your use of our website or services, violation of these Terms, or infringement of any third-party rights. 5. Changes to Terms We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Changes will be effective when posted on our website. Your continued use of our website after any changes constitutes your acceptance of the revised Terms. 6. Termination We may suspend or terminate your access to our website or services at any time, with or without cause, and with or without notice. Upon termination, you must cease all use of our website and services. 7. Governing Law These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India, without regard to its conflict of law principles. Any disputes arising from these Terms or your use of our website shall be resolved in the courts of India. 8. Contact Us If you have any questions or concerns about these Terms, please contact us at: happypaws@gmail.com Happy Paws Dhanekula Institute of Engineering & Technology, Vijayawada, Gangur, Andhra Pradesh 521139, India +91-220-2354125 happypaws@gmail.com Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions
pages.thank: Thank You for Visiting Happy Paws! body { font-family: Arial, sans-serif; background-color: #fff; margin: 0; padding: 0; display: flex; justify-content: center; align-items: center; height: 100vh; flex-direction: column; } .container { text-align: center; max-width: 600px; padding: 20px; background-color: #a0c2f8; border: 6px solid #e4e7ba; border-radius: 10px; } h1 { color: #000; } p { color: #000; margin-bottom: 20px; } .btn { text-decoration: none !important; border: 3px solid #e4e7ba; padding: 13px 20px 10px; width: 150px; box-sizing: border-box; height: 65px; height: 50px; color: #000; text-transform: uppercase; text-align: center; background-color: #e4e7ba; display: block; margin: 30px auto 0; box-sizing: border-box; border-radius: 10px; } .btn:hover { background-color: #fff; transition: 1s; } Thank you for visiting Happy Paws! We are delighted that you took the time to explore our website. Your interest in our products and services is greatly appreciated. If you have any questions, need assistance, or want to learn more about what we offer, please don't hesitate to reach out. We are here to help and ensure that you and your beloved pets have the best experience possible. Thank you for choosing Happy Paws, and we look forward to welcoming you back soon! main page
